milestone.title: Genesis
points: Modular & isolated Pools with linear interest rate models
Undercollateralized borrow market Simple on-click strategies
Easy to-use interface to create and manage strategies
Integration with Yagi vaults and JediSwap
Powerfull Price Convertor (support Lp and ERC4626)
Multi asset to one asset PathFinder
Full integration and unit tests, scripts API (User, pools and drips data) and on-chain data provider
Testnet phase A

milestone.title: Metamorph
points: Transition to Cairo 1.0
On-chain interest rate model parameters calculator
Bring auction mechanism for liquidation
Over-collateralized market
More data for users
Rooter improvement, allow Multi asset to Multi assets
Testnet phase B

milestone.title: Launch
points: Mainnet Launch
SDK Launch, adding some classic strategies
Drag & drop DeFi Block interface for drip management
Integration with Starknet ecosystem

milestone.title: After
points: Add NFT support (Uniswap V3 LP type integration but also explore solutions for highly liquid NFTs as collateral)
Flash loan from pool
Add uncollateralized borrow module
P2P Matching between both borrower types and suppliers
Support projects built at the top of Morphine
Mobile compatibility
UX improvement
